content: go granny go bag beginner crochet pattern by miss witchcrafts the go granny go bag is a mid sized sturdy crocheted bag perfect for any and every use--just grab and go the size and structure is ideal for shopping gym sessions craft projects on the move quick day or overnight trips and much more this bag is designed using the red heart all-in-one granny square skeins for minimal color changes and ends to weave in making it a fast and easy project for all skill levels instagram @misswitchcrafts + ribblr https //ribblr com/shop/miss-witchcrafts + ravelry https //www ravelry com/people/misswitchcrafts miss witchcrafts i m kiki a craft enthusiast and pet parent based in northern california i learned the basics of crochet nearly 30 years ago and in recent years have been designing crochet patterns i believe in accessibility and clear instruction within written crochet patterns so each of my designs is written to be enjoyed by crafters of all skill levels firmly within my granny era i adore cottagecore themes fresh florals and the versatility of simple stitches thank you for your interest in my design - i hope it serves you well and please don t hesitate to reach out with any questions or pattern assistance needs i would love to see your work please feel free to tag me on instagram - @misswitchcrafts m a t e r i a l s n e e d e d 1 skein red heart all-in-one aio yarn 1 skein complementary color see pattern notes 5 5 mm hook or size hook needed to achieve accurate continuous color/gauge yarn needle to weave in ends stitch markers optional snips s t i t c h e s & a b b r e v i a t i o n s u s t e r m s st / sts stitch / stitches chain/chs chain s sl slip stitch single_crochet single_crochet skip skip half_double_crochet half_double_crochet space - space double_crochet double_crochet yo - yarn over treble_crochet triple/treble_crochet magic_ring magic_ring fo fasten_off repeat * - repeat what is between * * pattern pattern notes a fun pattern needs fun yarn right the new red heart all-in-one granny square yarn is in stores now in so many fun colorways the innovative dye process of this yarn allows the crafter to crochet continuous 5-color granny squares without weaving in extra ends between color changes note i do not earn a commission on my recommendation of specific materials the recommendation is purely from personal preference brilliant crafters have discovered various types of squares to create with this yarn but for the purpose of this pattern we will be using basic granny squares if you are new to this yarn be aware that the dye process is not an exact science so it can be a bit fiddly if the colors are not lining up properly for you at the end of a round frog a bit and adjust your gauge as needed or feel free to use
